# Better Embeds

**Improves the look of Discord's new embeds.**

[![Desktop / Web](https://img.shields.io/badge/Desktop%20%2F%20Web-v0.1.0-yellowgreen.svg)](src/BetterEmbeds.css)

## Preview

![Desktop / Web](img/preview.png)

## Installation

### Desktop

[![BetterDiscord](https://img.shields.io/badge/Download%20for-BetterDiscord-285959.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://betterdiscord.net/ghdl?id=3028)

### Web

[![Stylus](https://img.shields.io/badge/Install%20with-Stylus-00adad.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://observeroftime.github.io/DiscordThemes/BetterEmbeds/dist/BetterEmbeds.user.css)
